title: Table event snowflake.table.dynamic.graph.valid_from.
db.query.text:
SELECT A.EMP_ID,A.EMP_NAME,A.EMP_ADDRESS, B.SKILL_ID,B.SKILL_NAME,B.SKILL_LEVEL
    FROM EMPLOYEE A, EMPLOYEE_SKILL B
    WHERE A.EMP_ID=B.EMP_ID
    ORDER BY B.SKILL_ID ;
db.collection.name: EMPLOYEE_DET
snowflake.schema.name: DYNAMIC_TABLE_SCH
service.name: test.dsoa2025
host.name: test.dsoa2025.snowflakecomputing.com
telemetry.exporter.name: dynatrace.snowagent
